title: Drawing, 1917-17-77, June 2, 1901
medium: Brush and gray wash, graphite on paper.
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite and ?, across top: June 2nd, 1901/ T. M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite and ?, across top: June 2nd, 1901/  T. M. spanish peak, Colorado; and again in ink: 37; and in graphite, color notations at various locations.

Verso: Inscribed in ?: No. 54.
description: Horizontal view of distant peaks across a wide plain with a canyon cutting through the terrain in the left foreground; buildings in right middle ground; rain falls.
